Manik Rathee

Designer, Developer, Photographer

PRIDE

Chicago, Illinois

Sun Jun 24 00:00:00 -0500 2012

Almost a million people. A parade to bring people together and support one another. There are not many times that someone could be brought to the verge of tears because they've experienced one of the most amazing things in humanity: unencumbered love and acceptance. This was one of those times.

All of the images below are free for your use. If you want to download the entire set, click here.

"Whoever you are … we don't love you in spite of that," he yelled. "We love you because of that." - Pastor David Weasley
